question.title: com.hazelcast.client.AuthenticationException: Authentication failed
question.body:
I am new on leveraging HazelCast. Experiencing an issue like; I have 3 applications, say App1(Gateway Application), App2(Service1) and App3(Service2). For all of them I have maintained the below programmatic HazelCast configurations:

Config hazelcastConfig = new Config();
hazelcastConfig.setClusterName("esb-cluster");

NetworkConfig networkConfig = hazelcastConfig.getNetworkConfig();
JoinConfig joinConfig = networkConfig.getJoin();

joinConfig.getMulticastConfig().setEnabled(false);

TcpIpConfig tcpIpConfig = joinConfig.getTcpIpConfig();
tcpIpConfig.setEnabled(true);
tcpIpConfig.setMembers(Arrays.asList("<Ip_address>:5701", "<Ip_address>:5702", "<Ip_address>:5703"));

VertxOptions options = new VertxOptions().setClusterManager(clusterManager);

Vertx.clusteredVertx(options, res -> {
  if (res.succeeded()) {
    Vertx vertx = res.result();

When I start all these 3 applications, they all connect to the cluster manager as can be seen below:

Notes:

  1. When I send a request from App1(Gateway Application) to App2(Service1), all is working as expected in terms, request, Processing and response back to my client application (Postman)
  2. When I send a request from App1(Gateway Application) to App3(Service2) the request gets through the gateway application just as expected into App3(Service2) and I can confirm a few methods getting executed. But the execution of my defined logic halts and I start seeing the below in my logs:

Log image

The below second part of the log happens to continue infinitely until I Ctrl + C Second part of the log

On Checking the logs on the other 2 applications i.e., App1(Gateway Application) to App2(Service1) I can see the below:

App2(Service1) and App3(Service2) - This is happening infinitely again until I kill the service App2(Service1) and App3(Service2) logs

vertx.version4.5.9
Java version - 17

Additionally, it seems I can also see in the logs where exceptions are popping up the cluster name coming up as [dev] while my defined cluster name is [esb-cluster]

Any help accorded will be highly appreciated. Thank you
